scripts.start: concurrently 'cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start' 'cd backend && npm run start'
scripts.dev: concurrently 'cd frontend && npm run dev' 'cd backend && npm run dev'
scripts.start:dev: concurrently 'cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start --  -p 8080' 'cd backend && npm run start -- -p 3007'
scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.production: npm run build && npm run start:dev
